fields.name: Monument
fields.text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you tuck six cards or score six cards during a single turn.

(May also be claimed via Masonry, from Age 1.

fields.name: Empire
fields.text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have three or more icons of all six types: [LIGHTBULB] [LEAF] [FACTORY] [CLOCK] [CROWN] [CASTLE]

(May also be claimed via Construction, from Age 2.

fields.name: World
fields.text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have twelve or more [CLOCK] on your board.

May also be claimed via Translation, from Age 3.

fields.name: Wonder
fields.text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have five colors on your board, and each is splayed either up or right.

(May also be claimed via Invention, from Age 4.)

fields.name: Universe
fields.text:
Claim this special achievement immediately if you have five top cards, and each is of value 8 or higher.

(May also be claimed via Astronomy, from Age 5.

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of value one higher than the card you returned.
cards.name: Agriculture

dogmas: [CASTLE][SUP]: I demand you draw a [1], then transfer the highest card in your hand to my hand!
cards.name: Archery

dogmas: [LEAF]: Meld a card from your hand of different color from any card on your board.
[LEAF]: Draw and score a [1] for each color present on your board not present on any other player's board.
cards.name: Clothing

dogmas: [CROWN]: You may tuck a card from your hand of the same color as any card on your board. If you do, you may splay that color of your cards left.
cards.name: Code of Laws

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top card with a [CASTLE] from your board to my board if you have at least four [CASTLE] on your board! If you do, draw a [1]!
cards.name: City States

dogmas: [CASTLE]: Meld the lowest card in your hand. Draw a [1].
cards.name: Domestication

dogmas: [CASTLE]: You may meld any number of cards from your hand, each with a [CASTLE]. If you melded four or more cards, claim the Monument achievement.
cards.name: Masonry

dogmas: [CASTLE]: Draw and reveal a [1]. If it has a [CASTLE], score it and repeat this dogma effect. Otherwise, keep it.
cards.name: Metalworking

dogmas: [CASTLE]: Draw a [1]. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a [1].
cards.name: Mysticism

dogmas: [CASTLE][SUP]: I demand you transfer a card with a [CROWN] from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a [1].
[CASTLE]: If no cards were transferred due to this demand, draw a [1].
cards.name: Oars

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may return up to three cards from your hand. If you returned any cards, draw and score a card of value equal to the number of cards you returned.
[LEAF]: Draw a [1].
cards.name: Pottery

dogmas: [CROWN]: Draw and meld a [1].
cards.name: Sailing

dogmas: [CASTLE]: Draw two [1].
cards.name: The Wheel

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a [3].
[LIGHTBULB]: You may return a [3] from your hand. If you do, draw three [1].
cards.name: Tools

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Draw a [2].
cards.name: Writing

dogmas: [LEAF]: If you have more cards in your score pile than in your hand, draw two [3].
cards.name: Calendar

dogmas: [CROWN]: You may exchange all the highest cards in your hand with all the highest cards in your score pile.
cards.name: Canal Building

dogmas: [CROWN]: You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a [2] for every different value of card you returned.
cards.name: Currency

dogmas: [CASTLE][SUP]: I demand you transfer two cards from your hand to my hand, then draw a [2]!
[CASTLE]: If you are the only player with five top cards, claim the Empire achievement.
cards.name: Construction

dogmas: [LEAF]: Draw a [2] for every two [LEAF] icons on your board.
cards.name: Fermenting

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a [1] from your score pile to my score pile.
[CROWN]: If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a [1].
cards.name: Mapmaking

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a card of value one higher than the card you returned.
cards.name: Mathematics

dogmas: [CASTLE][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top card on your board of a different color from any card on my board to my score pile! If you do, draw and tuck a [1]!
[CASTLE]: Draw and tuck a [1].
cards.name: Monotheism

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may splay left any one color of your cards.
[LIGHTBULB]: You may score a card from your hand.
cards.name: Philosophy

dogmas: [CASTLE]: Meld one or two cards from your hand. If you melded two, you may transfer your top red card to another player's board. In exchange, transfer that player's top green card to your board.
cards.name: Road Building

dogmas: [CASTLE]: Draw and reveal a [4] for every 3 [CASTLE] icons on your board. If any of the drawn cards are red, return the cards drawn and all cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
[CASTLE]: Meld a card from your hand, then score a card from your hand.
cards.name: Alchemy

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return the highest card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the highest card remaining in your score pile.
cards.name: Education

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [LEAF] from your board to my board, and then transfer a top card without a [LEAF] from my board to your board.
cards.name: Compass

dogmas: [CASTLE][SUP]: I demand you transfer all top cards with a [CASTLE] from your board to my score pile!
[CASTLE]: You may splay your red cards left.
cards.name: Engineering

dogmas: [CASTLE][SUP]: I demand you transfer a card with a [CASTLE] from your hand to my hand!
[CASTLE]: You may splay your yellow or purple cards left.
cards.name: Feudalism

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you exchange all cards in your hand with all the highest cards in my hand!
[LEAF]: Score a card from your hand with a [CASTLE]. You may splay your red cards left.
cards.name: Machinery

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you exchange the highest card in your score pile with the lowest card in my score pile.
cards.name: Medicine

dogmas: [CROWN]: Draw and meld a [3]. If it has a [CROWN], draw and score a [4]. Otherwise, transfer a card from your score pile to the score pile of an opponent with fewer points than you.
cards.name: Optics

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may splay your green or blue cards left.
[LIGHTBULB]: Draw a [4] for every color you have splayed left.
cards.name: Paper

dogmas: [CROWN]: You may meld all the cards in your score pile. If you meld one, you must meld them all.
[CROWN]: If each top card on your board has a [CROWN], claim the World achievement.
cards.name: Translation

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you return a card from your score pile! If you do, return a top card of equal value from your board!
cards.name: Anatomy

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Draw and tuck a [3]. If it has a [CROWN], repeat this dogma effect.
cards.name: Colonialism

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a [CROWN] from your board to my board! If you do, draw and meld a [4]!
[CROWN]: You may splay your green cards right.
cards.name: Enterprise

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Draw and meld a [5].
cards.name: Experimentation

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top card with a [CASTLE] from your board to my score pile!
[FACTORY]: If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a [2].
cards.name: Gunpowder

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may splay right any one color of your cards currently splayed left. If you do, draw and score a [4].
[LIGHTBULB]: If you have five colors splayed, each in any direction, claim the Wonder achievement.
cards.name: Invention

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a [2] or [3] from your score pile to my score pile!
cards.name: Navigation

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand for every two [LIGHTBULB] icons on your board.
cards.name: Perspective

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the top purple card on your board.
[LIGHTBULB]: You may splay your blue cards right.
cards.name: Printing Press

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may tuck a card from your hand for every two [LEAF] icons on your board.
[LEAF]: You may splay your yellow or purple cards right.
cards.name: Reformation

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Draw and reveal a [6]. If the card is green or blue, meld it and repeat this dogma effect.
[LIGHTBULB]: If all non-purple top cards on your board are value [6] or higher, claim the Universe achievement.
cards.name: Astronomy

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [FACTORY] from your board to my board! If you do, draw and score a [5].
[CROWN]: You may splay your green cards right.
cards.name: Banking

dogmas: [FACTORY]: You may splay your blue cards right.
[FACTORY]: Draw and score a card of value one higher than the highest top card on your board and then return a card from your score pile.
cards.name: Chemistry

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Draw and tuck a [5].
[FACTORY]: You may splay your red cards right.
[FACTORY]: You may score any one of your top cards. If you do, also score the card beneath it.
cards.name: Coal

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, splay any one color of your cards right, and draw a card of value equal to the number of cards of that color on your board.
cards.name: Measurement

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Draw three [6] and reveal them. If two or more of the drawn cards are of the same color, return the drawn cards and all the cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
cards.name: Physics

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a [LIGHTBULB] from your board to my board! If you do, draw a [5]!
cards.name: Societies

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you transfer the highest card in your score pile to your hand! If you do, and have only one card in your hand afterwards, repeat this demand!
[LEAF]: You may splay your yellow cards right.
cards.name: Statistics

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Draw and tuck two [4], then score your bottom yellow card.
cards.name: Steam Engine

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer two cards of value [4] or less from your score pile to my score pile!
[CROWN]: If any card was transferred due to the demand, score the lowest top card with a [CROWN] from your board.
cards.name: The Pirate Code

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may splay your blue cards right.
[LIGHTBULB]: Draw and meld a [7].
cards.name: Atomic Theory

dogmas: [FACTORY]: You may draw and tuck a [6]. If you do, score all your top cards without a [FACTORY].
[FACTORY]: You may splay your yellow cards right.
cards.name: Canning

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Reveal the color of a card from your hand. Take into your hand all cards of that color from all other players' hands. Then, meld all cards of that color from your hand.
cards.name: Classification

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you have returned more cards than any other player due to Democracy this phase, draw and score an [8].
cards.name: Democracy

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you transfer a card from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a [6]!
[FACTORY]: You may splay your red or purple cards right.
cards.name: Emancipation

dogmas: [CROWN]: You may meld all the highest cards in your score pile. If you meld one of the highest, you must meld all of the highest.
cards.name: Encyclopedia

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Draw and tuck a [6] for every two [FACTORY] icons on your board.
[FACTORY]: You may splay your red or purple cards right.
cards.name: Industrialization

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Draw and score a card of value equal to the highest card in your score pile.
cards.name: Machine Tools

dogmas: [CROWN]: If your green cards are splayed right, you may splay any color of your cards right.
[CROWN]: You may splay your green cards right.
cards.name: Metric System

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you return all the lowest cards in your score pile! If you returned any, draw and meld a [6]!
[LEAF]: If any card was returned as a result of the demand, draw and meld a [7].
cards.name: Vaccination

dogmas: [CROWN]: You may exchange all the cards in your hand with all the cards in your score pile. If you exchange one, you must exchange them all.
cards.name: Bicycle

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer two cards from your score pile to my score pile!
cards.name: Combustion

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Return all your top cards without a [FACTORY], then draw an [8] for each card you returned.
cards.name: Electricity

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may choose to either draw and score an [8] and then return a card from your score pile, or draw a card of value one higher than the highest card in your score pile.
cards.name: Evolution

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you transfer your three highest cards from your hand to my hand! If you do, and then have no cards in hand, draw a [7]!
cards.name: Explosives

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may tuck up to three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a [7] for every different value of card you tucked.
cards.name: Lighting

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may rearrange the order of one color of cards on your board.
[LIGHTBULB]: You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.
cards.name: Publications

dogmas: [CLOCK]: Return all cards from your hand, then draw three [6].
[CLOCK]: You may splay up any one color of your cards currently splayed right.
cards.name: Railroad

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you return half (rounded down) of the cards in your hand.
[LEAF]: You may score a card from your hand.
cards.name: Refrigeration

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you exchange the two highest cards in your hand with the lowest card in my hand!
cards.name: Sanitation

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may return up to three cards from your hand. For every different value of card that you returned, draw two [8].
cards.name: Antibiotics

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [FACTORY] from your board to my score pile! If you do, draw and meld an [8]!
[FACTORY]: Draw and meld an [8].
cards.name: Corporations

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Choose two colors, then draw and reveal a [9]. If it is either of the colors you chose, meld it and you may splay your cards of that color up.
[LIGHTBULB]: If you have twenty or more [LIGHTBULB] icons on your board, you win.
cards.name: Empiricism

dogmas: [CROWN]: If your red cards are splayed up, you may splay any color of your cards up.
[CROWN]: You may splay your red cards up.
cards.name: Flight

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, choose a value, and return all cards of that value from all score piles.
[LIGHTBULB]: You may splay your purple cards up.
cards.name: Mass Media

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you transfer your two highest non-red cards without a [FACTORY] from your board to my score pile! If you transferred any cards, draw an [8]!
cards.name: Mobility

dogmas: [CLOCK]: You may return up to two cards from your hand. If you return two, draw a [10] and then draw and score a [10].
cards.name: Quantum Theory

dogmas: [CLOCK]: Return a card in any other player's score pile for every two [CLOCK] icons on your board.
cards.name: Rocketry

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you transfer a top non-yellow card with a [CLOCK] from your board to my board! If you do, score the card beneath it, and return all other cards from that pile!
cards.name: Skyscrapers

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may tuck all cards from your hand. If you tuck one, you must tuck them all. If you tucked at least one purple card, take all the lowest cards in each other player's hand into your hand.
cards.name: Socialism

dogmas: [CROWN][SUP]: I demand you draw two [9] and reveal them. Transfer the card of my choice to my board, and meld the other.
[CROWN]: If you have ten or more green cards on your board, you win.
cards.name: Collaboration

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you transfer all but one card from your hand to my hand! Also, transfer the highest card from your score pile to my score pile!
cards.name: Composites

dogmas: [CLOCK]: You may splay your red cards or your green cards up.
[CLOCK]: Draw and meld a [10], then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
cards.name: Computers

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand and draw two [10].
cards.name: Ecology

dogmas: [CLOCK][SUP]: I demand you draw a [10]! If it is red, remove all hands, boards, and score piles from the game! If this occurs, the dogma action is complete.
[CLOCK]: Return a top card other than Fission from any player's board.
cards.name: Fission

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Draw and meld a [10]. Score all cards beneath it.
cards.name: Genetics

dogmas: [CLOCK]: Return all cards from your hand, and draw three [8].
[CLOCK]: You may splay your purple cards up.
[CLOCK]: Meld a card from your hand and then execute each of its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
cards.name: Satellites

dogmas: [LEAF][SUP]: I demand you transfer all the highest cards from your score pile to my hand! If you transferred any cards, then transfer a top card from my board without a [LEAF] to your hand!
cards.name: Services

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Reveal a card from your hand. Take into your hand the top card of that color from all other players' boards.
[FACTORY]: You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.
cards.name: Specialization

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may tuck any number of cards from your hand. Draw and score a [1] for each card you tucked.
cards.name: Suburbia

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: Draw and score a [10].
[LIGHTBULB]: If Robotics and Software are top cards on any board, the single player with the lowest score wins.
cards.name: A.I.

dogmas: [CLOCK]: Transfer a top card with a [LEAF] from any other player's board to your score pile.
[CLOCK]: If any player has fewer than three [LEAF] icons on their board, the single player with the most [LEAF] icons on their board wins.
cards.name: Bioengineering

dogmas: [CLOCK][SUP]: I demand you return half (rounded up) of the cards in your score pile!
cards.name: Databases

dogmas: [FACTORY][SUP]: I demand you return a top card with a [LEAF] on your board!
[FACTORY]: Draw and score a [6]. If no player has more [LEAF] icons than [FACTORY] icons on their board, the single player with the most points wins.
cards.name: Globalization

dogmas: [LIGHTBULB]: You may return a card from your hand. If you returned a [10], draw a [10] for every different value of card in your score pile.
cards.name: Miniaturization

dogmas: [FACTORY]: Score your top green card. Draw and meld a [10], then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
cards.name: Robotics

dogmas: [CROWN]: Execute the non-demand dogma effects of any other top card on your board for yourself only.
[CROWN]: If you have more achievements than each other player, you win.
cards.name: Self Service

dogmas: [CLOCK]: Draw and score a [10].
[CLOCK]: Draw and meld two [10], then execute the second card's non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.
cards.name: Software

dogmas: [LEAF]: You may score all cards from your hand. If you score one, you must score them all.
cards.name: Stem Cells

dogmas: [CLOCK]: You may splay your green cards up.
[CLOCK]: Draw and score a [10].
[CLOCK]: Draw and meld a [10] for every two [CLOCK] icons on your board.
cards.name: The Internet
